Introduction
This topic contains special policies and procedures for IU decisions, including
considering multiple disabilities in IU claims
handling claims requiring Compensation Service approval
considering
IU for incarcerated Veterans
, and
IU on a temporary basis
entitlement to SMC at the housebound rate if the IU rating is based on a single disability
, and
determining whether to substitute a single 100-percent schedular evaluation for IU in housebound cases
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C - Individual Unemployability (IU) Rating and Decision Review
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C
